replies.msg:
薪俸與津貼 :

A. 隊員凡參加訓練或在緊急事故期間奉召執勤，或自願在災場協助而得在場長官許可，其薪津將按照職階和下列規定而支付：

i. 隊員如服務不足八小時，薪津依照時薪率計算。
ii. 隊員由報到時間起計的二十四小時內（不論該二十四小時是否在同一天內），如服務足八小時或超過八小時，薪津按日薪率計算。
B.
口糧津貼：隊員參加服務連續達八小時或超過八小時，而在該段時間內無免費膳食或口糧供應，可領取規定的口糧津貼。

此回覆已被刪除

係真
高層搞啲垃圾出黎

Special Duties for CAS in Road Clearance on 14.11.2019

This serves to confirm that CAS will deploy 2 mobile teams (1 officer and 19 members/team) to assist in road clearance tomorrow (14.11.2019) and may be onward. Our duty teams will be on standby at CAS HQ / Ops Base and upon EMSC’s request, they will be deployed to assist in removing obstacles from the main roads (but not on highways, unless working together with HyD staff). CAS duty personnel will retreat from the duty sites if they are faced with challenges from protestors or if there is potential violence at the sites.

Deployment on 14.11.2019 (Duty hour 0700 - 1700 hrs or till stand-down)
1. CAS CCC will be activated in Skeleton Manning (1 off +2 mbrs);
2. Total 2 Ops Teams from TF and HK will be deployed to clear the road blockage (a Team (1 offr + 19 mbrs (min. 15)) from each Region/Force.
3. SQ (2 members) will man the HQ Ops Store; and
4. ST (5 drivers) will perform driving duty for 3 vans and 2 lorries (with wire mesh).
5. SC (1 mbr) will maintain the RT network and communication

Reporting
All CAS personnel should report duty at their respective Ops Base at 0700 hrs and inform CAS CCC for duty briefing and allocation.

Dress & Equipment
Full ops with helmet and leather gloves.
HQ Ops Store would provide the necessary team ops equipment.

Ag. COO

quote.msg:
係真
高層搞啲垃圾出黎

Special Duties for CAS in Road Clearance on 14.11.2019

This serves to confirm that CAS will deploy 2 mobile teams (1 officer and 19 members/team) to assist in road clearance tomorrow (14.11.2019) and may be onward. Our duty teams will be on standby at CAS HQ / Ops Base and upon EMSC’s request, they will be deployed to assist in removing obstacles from the main roads (but not on highways, unless working together with HyD staff). CAS duty personnel will retreat from the duty sites if they are faced with challenges from protestors or if there is potential violence at the sites.

Deployment on 14.11.2019 (Duty hour 0700 - 1700 hrs or till stand-down)
1. CAS CCC will be activated in Skeleton Manning (1 off +2 mbrs);
2. Total 2 Ops Teams from TF and HK will be deployed to clear the road blockage (a Team (1 offr + 19 mbrs (min. 15)) from each Region/Force.
3. SQ (2 members) will man the HQ Ops Store; and
4. ST (5 drivers) will perform driving duty for 3 vans and 2 lorries (with wire mesh).
5. SC (1 mbr) will maintain the RT network and communication

Reporting
All CAS personnel should report duty at their respective Ops Base at 0700 hrs and inform CAS CCC for duty briefing and allocation.

Dress & Equipment
Full ops with helmet and leather gloves.
HQ Ops Store would provide the necessary team ops equipment.

Ag. COO

quote.msg: 得車錢咋

薪俸與津貼 :

A. 隊員凡參加訓練或在緊急事故期間奉召執勤，或自願在災場協助而得在場長官許可，其薪津將按照職階和下列規定而支付：

i. 隊員如服務不足八小時，薪津依照時薪率計算。
ii. 隊員由報到時間起計的二十四小時內（不論該二十四小時是否在同一天內），如服務足八小時或超過八小時，薪津按日薪率計算。
B.
口糧津貼：隊員參加服務連續達八小時或超過八小時，而在該段時間內無免費膳食或口糧供應，可領取規定的口糧津貼。
at least $43/hrs

replies.msg:
民安隊件衫唔防火
千其唔好燒
即係唔夠人用了

澄清幾點
1. 民記係有糧出不過少到不得了
所以一入黎已經講定比recruit聽唔好當pt返
留低嘅我相信都真係有心人想服務社會
2. 入面嘅黃藍比例真係好難講
上面藍就一定㗎啦
的士佬收嘅52萬都係副處長黃英豪畀
處長羅仁禮係人大政協
下年班兵就一半半
癈老唔少但間唔中都有幾個黃
後生嘅大概有兩成係藍
（ 每年開班都會問入嚟想做咩
總會有abt兩成人答想轉去紀律部隊）
但黃嘅大多數轉去消防救護
3. 雖然係叫call out但今日唔係動員令
最多係要解釋點解接唔到call
唔出嚟係唔會有紀律處分
（鬼會有咩，成個部隊都唔夠人仲趕人走？）
所以今日出得嚟嗰班一定係藍
4. 睇返order，唔會出cadet搵細路做
5. 佢哋冇警察權力冇拘捕權唔會陀槍
最多跟Cap 518 移走妨礙民安隊工作嘅人同物件
6. 六月以黎唔係無落場幫手
而係上面壓力唔可以用民記個名出
上次有人袋住民記件反光衣比popo都要寫report
你估上面肯唔肯幫你手？
我見過唔少未出班既落左堂就出去旺角尖咀
我都落過場用民記教我既野去幫手

我打咁大段野唔係想幫部隊洗白
只係唔想咁多有心既師兄比班癈老高層影衰哂
